content:
Do we have Functionally Hausdorff spaces (also known under various other names, see header)?

See https://topology.pi-base.org/properties/P000009/ for context. It is the first property form pi-base that seems to be missing, so I was curious if it is missing indeed. If it is, which naming should we go for?
Please list the various other names. That might help people to recognize if we have it in some form...

Johan Commelin said:

Please list the various other names. That might help people to recognize if we have it in some form...

I've put them in the header, here are all 4:

  • Functionally Hausdorff
  • Completely Hausdorff
  • Urysohn (Not Frechet-Urysohn)
  • Completely T2
